text: Giacomino Granchi was an Italian politician. Granchi was a member of the Italian Socialist Party and was elected Mayor of Pisa on 15 July 1986, after the resignation of mayor Oriano Ripoli. He served as assessor for urbanistics policies and Deputy President of Tuscany from 1990 to 1992. ==References== ==See also== *1985 Italian local elections *List of mayors of Pisa ==External links== * * Category:1946 births Category:Mayors of Pisa Category:Italian Socialist Party politicians Category:2011 deaths Category:20th-century Italian politicians
title: Giacomino Granchi
